one.question: What is this website's purpose?
one.answer: The site makes it easier to assign projects to students from MIAGE.

two.question: How do I get my credentials?
two.answer: You must create an account using the form on the 'Create an account' page, available from the 'Account' tab.

three.question: I forgot my credentials, what should I do?
three.answer: You can request a new password by clicking on 'Did you forget your password?' present on the connection pop-in.

four.question: Can we use the site on smartphone / tablet?
four.answer: The site incorporates the concept of responsiveness, which means that it is accessible on any type of device.

one.question: How to create a project?
one.answer: When you are connected, you must go to the 'Projects' page, accessible from the menu by clicking on 'Entities', then 'Project. Then, you will find a button 'Create a new project', which will take you to a form that you must fill out with a certain amount of information.

two.question: Can we create several projects?
two.answer: It is entirely possible for a user to create more than one project.

one.question: How to apply for a project with other students?
one.answer: After logging in with your credentials, you can view the list of available projects on the 'Projects' page, accessible from the menu by clicking on' Entities' then 'Project.'

two.question: Can we apply for several projects?
two.answer: A group of students can only apply to one project simultaneously.

three.question: By which ways will we know our assignment?
three.answer: Once the client has assigned a group, you will be informed by email of his decision (positive or negative).

four.question: What happens if the chosen project is assigned to another group?
four.answer: You are notified by email that the project has not been assigned to you. You can then connect to the site, and apply again to a project still available.

five.question: How to transfer the requested documents?
five.answer: Go to the page dedicated to your project, which will allow you to put all the required documents.

team.title: Who created this website ?
team.message: This website was created by BALAT Audrey, BUREAU Tiffany, KIRCH Florent, MONGE Maxime, PREVERAUD Nicolas, 2020 promotion.
